title: 100% THAT Corny, Dolly Defeats KKK? 12.13.19
itunes:title: 100% THAT Corny, Dolly Defeats KKK? 12.13.19
description:
In episode 535, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Laci Mosley to discuss Pete Buttigieg meeting Lizzo, Trump attacking Greta Thunberg, the removal of the Nathan Bedford Forrest bust from Tennessee's capitol, Bloomberg thinking he can take California, the 'conversation squad,' Harvey Weinstein using a walker, Disney making an Aladdin spin-off, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: Pete Buttigieg meets Lizzo, says he’s "100% that nominee"
  2. After Greta Thunberg Wins 'Time' Honor, Trump Suggests She 'Chill' And Watch A Movie
  3. It's time to move the Nathan Bedford Forrest bust from Tennessee's Capitol, GOP leader says
  4. Bloomberg faces scrutiny over stop-and-frisk on first California visit as 2020 hopeful
  5. WATCH: The Conservative Squad on Fox & Friends
  6. Harvey Weinstein, 67, arrives at court with a walker after complaining about back injury as judge increases his bail to $5MILLION and warns him not to let his health get in the way of January trial
  7. Mena Massoud: After ‘Aladdin’ Made $1 Billion, I Still Couldn’t Get an Audition
  8. Will Smith Gives Advice To ‘Aladdin’ Co-Star Mena Massoud Who Can’t Snag Any Auditions
  9. 'Aladdin' Spinoff Featuring Prince Anders in the Works at Disney+ (Exclusive)
  10. WATCH: 10 -Misled Children

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
